Class MatchField

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicam.cs.pa.ConnectFour.core.MatchField
  • public final class MatchField
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a match field
    Author:
    giacche`

        public CellStatus getCellStatus​(CellLocation cellLocation)

      • getGettersMap

        public java.util.Map<java.util.function.Function<CellLocation,java.util.List<Cell>>,java.util.function.Function<CellLocation,java.lang.Integer>> getGettersMap()
        Return a Map, see return for details
        Returns:
        A Map that contains a set of entries that are a couple of functions:
        1. The first given function of each entry returns a list of cells basing on a passed CellLocation and an arbitrary direction,
        2. The second one converts a CellLocation in an Integer returning the index that change in every Cell in the list (e.g. column for the row array, row for the column's one, etc...)
